title: A Referral link to gain new stakers and TVL
body:
We should make a referral link connected to your Eth address so you can get others to join and get rewarded for this.

The reward should be about 0.3% of ongoing reward to the person who referred.

This way we can see every one incentives to gain new people to DRC

Everyone should have a referral link like this.

Watch the below video for a good idea

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JrDExDiQEkM
author: 0xe5df77b5c1C541cDA961bAFBdaB2b9FB94831f98
